trans-unit.source: Represents an exception used to communicate task cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 表示用來傳達工作取消的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException.Task" /> property is thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException.Task" />屬性是安全執行緒，而且可能會在從多個執行緒同時使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 以系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會將新執行個體的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 屬性初始化為系統提供用來描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>:
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.OperationCanceledException>:

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 說明例外狀況的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: A task that has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 已取消的工作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 使用已取消之 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=248602).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=248602)。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 說明例外狀況的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the task associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個例外狀況相關聯的工作。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that is associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: 與這個例外狀況相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: It is permissible for no Task to be associated with a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>, in which case this property will return null.
trans-unit.target: 沒有相關聯的工作，您可以允許<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>，在此情況下，此屬性會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: This property is thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是安全執行緒，可能會在從多個執行緒同時使用。
